section.heading: Manufacture or delivery of an imitation controlled substance.

content.p: Except as provided in AS 11.73.050 , a person may not manufacture, deliver, or possess with intent to deliver, an imitation controlled substance.
Except as provided in AS 11.73.030 , a person who violates this section commits a class C felony.

section.heading: Possession of substance with intent to manufacture.

content.p: Except as provided in AS 11.73.050 , a person may not possess the following substances or their salts with the intent to manufacture an imitation controlled substance:
A person who violates this section commits a class C felony.

section.heading: Delivery of an imitation controlled substance to a minor.

content.p: Except as provided in AS 11.73.050 , a person 19 years of age or older may not deliver an imitation controlled substance to a person under 19 years of age, who is at least three years younger than the person delivering the substance.
A person who violates this section commits a class B felony.

section.heading: Advertisement to promote the delivery of an imitation controlled substance.

content.p: Except as provided in AS 11.73.050 , a person may not knowingly place in a newspaper, magazine, handbill, or other publication, or post or distribute in a public place, an advertisement or solicitation knowing that the purpose of the advertisement or solicitation is to promote the delivery of an imitation controlled substance in the state.
A person who violates this section commits a class C felony.

Sec. 11.73.050. Imitation controlled substance as placebo. No civil or criminal liability may be imposed under this chapter on a person who manufactures, delivers, possesses, or advertises or solicits to promote delivery of an imitation controlled substance solely for use as a placebo prescribed by a registered practitioner, as defined in AS 11.71.900 , in the course of professional practice or research.
Property used during or in aid of a violation of this chapter may be forfeited to the state to the extent permitted under and in accordance with the provisions of AS 17.30.110  17.30.126.

For purposes of this section the terms controlled substance and this chapter, as used in AS 17.30.110  17.30.126, shall be construed as imitation controlled substance and  AS 11.73  respectively.
